tags.name: SDK profiles
tags.description: Provides function for manage SDK profiles

get.description: Checks if CTL schema with same fqn is already exists in the sibling application. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: fqn
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the CTL schema

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The Tenant ID of the CTL schema does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Deletes a CTL schema. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: fqn
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the CTL schema

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the CTL schema

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The tenant ID of the CTL schema does not match the tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: A CTL schema with the specified fully qualified name, version number, tenant and application identifiers does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Exports a CTL schema and, depending on the export method specified, all of its dependencies. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: fqn
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the CTL schema

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the CTL schema

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The schema export method (either SHALLOW, FLAT, DEEP or LIBRARY)

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER) or the Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: The CTL schema with the given fqn, version and application Id does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns a list of available CTL schemas metadata for an application. The current user must have one of the following roles: TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER, or TENANT_USER) or Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the user

404.description: An application with the specified applicationToken does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.summary: Get flat schema by it's id
get.description: Returns a flat schema. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The tenant ID of the CTL schema does not match the tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: A CTL schema with the specified id does not exist.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns a CTL schema. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: fqn
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the CTL schema

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the CTL schema

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The tenant ID of the CTL schema does not match the tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: A CTL schema with the specified fully qualified name and version number does not exist.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.summary: Get CTL schema by it's id
get.description: Returns a CTL schema. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The tenant ID of the CTL schema does not match the tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: A CTL schema with the specified id does not exist.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns a list of available system CTL schemas metadata. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns a list of available CTL schemas metadata for current tenant. The current user must have one of the following roles: TENANT_ADMIN, TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.summary: Promote CTL schema from application scope to Tenant
post.description: Promote existing CTL schema meta info scope from application to tenant. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: fqn
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the CTL schema

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The Tenant ID of the CTL schema does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Creates a CTL schema with application token. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

400.description: The CTL schema body provided is invalid

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The tenant ID of the CTL schema does not match the tenant ID of the authenticated user

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Activates a configuration. Sets the status field of the configuration to ACTIVE, increments the sequenceNumber field value by 1, and sets the activateUsername and activatedTime fields to the name of the user who has submitted the request and the activation time respectively. Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to perform this operation.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER) or the Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: Configuration with the specified configurationId not found

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Activates a profile filter. Sets the status field of the profile filter to ACTIVE, increments the sequenceNumber field value by 1, and sets the activateUsername and activatedTime fields to the name of the user who submitted the request and the activation time respectively. Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to perform this operation.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER) or the Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: Profile filter with the specified profileFilterId not found

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Adds the event class family schema to the event class family with the specified ID. The current user will be marked as the creator of schema. Only users with the TENANT_ADMIN role are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: eventClassFamilyId
parameters.description: A unique event class family identifier

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Event class family schema represented in json format

400.description: The specified event class family schema is not a valid avro schema

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_ADMIN) or the Tenant ID of the specified event class family does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: A file with the event class family schema was not found in the form data or an event class family with the specified ID does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Adds the specified topic to the specified endpoint group. Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to perform this operation.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER) or the Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: A topic with the specified topicId or an endpoint group with the specified endpointGroupId does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.summary: Select tenant admins by tenant id

400.description: The specified tenantId is not valid

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required TENANT_ADMIN role or the Tenant ID of the editing user does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: The user with the specified tenantId does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Creates or edits an application. To create an application you do not need to specify the application ID. To edit the application specify the application ID. If the application with the specified ID exists, it will be updated. Only users with the TENANT_ADMIN role are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: ApplicationDto body. Mandatory fields: name, tenantId

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_ADMIN) or the Tenant ID of the application to be edited does not match the Tenant ID of the user

404.description: An application to be edited with the specified application ID does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.summary: Get application based on application token
get.description: Returns an application by applicationToken. The current user must have one of the following roles: TENANT_ADMIN, TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_ADMIN, TENANT_DEVELOPER, or TENANT_USER) or Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the user

404.description: An application with the specified applicationToken does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Creates or edits an application event family map. If an application event family map with the specified ID does not exist, it will be created. If an application event family map with the specified ID exists, it will be updated. Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: applicationEventFamilyMap
parameters.description: ApplicationEventFamilyMapDto body. Mandatory fields: applicationId, ecfId, ecfName, eventMaps

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER) or the Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: An application event family map to be edited with the specified applicationEventFamilyMapId does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns an application event family map by application event family map ID. Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to request this information.

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER) or the Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: An application event family map with the specified applicationEventFamilyMapId does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns all applications for the current authorized user within the current tenant. The current user must have one of the following roles: TENANT_ADMIN, TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER.

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_ADMIN, TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER)

post.description: Changes the password of a user. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: A user name of the user whose password is to be changed

parameters.name: oldPassword
parameters.description: An old password of the user

parameters.name: newPassword
parameters.description: A new password of the user; it must be no shorter than 6 characters

400.description: The specified parameters are not valid

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns information about the current authorized user. Only authorized users are allowed to perform this operation.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Creates a user with the KAA_ADMIN role.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: A user name of the Kaa admin user

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: A user password of the Kaa admin user; it must be no shorter than 6 characters

403.description: A user with the KAA_ADMIN role already exists

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Creates or updates a configuration. To create configuration you do not need to specify the configuration ID, createUsername field will be set to the name of the user who has uploaded it. To edit the configuration specify the configuration id. If a configuration with the specified ID exists, the configuration will be updated and its modifyUsername will be set to the user who has submitted the request. Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: ConfigurationDto body. Mandatory fields: applicationId, schemaId, endpointGroupId, body

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER) or the Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: An endpoint group with the specified endpointGroupId does not exist or a configuration with the specified configurationId not found

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns the configuration record for the specified endpoint group and configuration schema. Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to request this information.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.summary: Get endpoint profiles bodies based on endpoint group id

parameters.description: The id of the endpoint group.

parameters.description: The maximum number of shown profiles. (Optional parameter)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset from beginning of profiles list. (Optional parameter)

post.description: Creates or updates a profile filter. To create profile filter you do not need to specify the profile filter ID, createUsername field will be set to the name of the user who has created it. To edit the profile filter specify the profile filer ID, if a profile filter with the specified ID exists, the profile filter will be updated and its modifyUsername will be set to the user who has submitted the request. Only users with the  TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to perform this operation.

parameters.name: profileFilter
parameters.description: ProfileFilterDto body. Mandatory fields: applicationId, body, either endpointProfileSchemaId or serverProfileSchemaId or both of them

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

post.description: Creates or updates a log schema. If a log schema with the specified ID does not exist, then it will be created and its createUsername field of the schema will be set to the name of the user who has uploaded it, a unique version number will be generated (incrementally) for this schema. If a configuration with the specified ID exists, the configuration will be updated. Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to perform this operation.

Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to perform this operation.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns a list of all users associated with the current authorized user: users whose Tenant ID values match the Tenant ID of the request submitter. Only users with the TENANT_ADMIN role are allowed to submit this request.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_ADMIN)

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns all vacant (not being used by endpoint group configurations) configuration schemas for the specified endpoint group. Only users with the TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to request this information.

401.description: The user is not authenticated or invalid credentials were provided

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER) or the Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: An endpoint group to be edited with the specified endpointGroupId does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side

get.description: Returns all vacant (not being used by application event family maps) event class families for the specified application. Only users with the  TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER role are allowed to request this information.

403.description: The authenticated user does not have the required role (TENANT_DEVELOPER or TENANT_USER) or the Tenant ID of the application does not match the Tenant ID of the authenticated user

404.description: An application with the specified applicationToken does not exist

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server side
